heading: Food & Bevarages
info: We offer customized packaging solutions for food and beverages that are flexible and ensure hygiene, safety as well as a waste reduction. there are many strict laws and protocols to be followed when it comes to the packaging of food and beverages. we keep up to date with the changing food packaging manufacturing protocols and offer solutions accordingly. we provide packaging for :
list: Bakery products like toast, khari, breads, biscuits
All types of chutney and paste, ketchups, pickles, sweets
